snippet.title: The Torrential Turnabout [FT] Part 1: Sheol's Dead And Breakfast
snippet.description:
[A Visual Novelty First-Time Playthroufh]

Part I: Another Time, Another Place

We're in this for the long haul, and it's going to be glorious.

We're playing as a fellow named Roland who wakes up in a strange place with a bunch of unfamiliar folks, none of which seem to remember how they got here. (Orlando Furioso Library of Ruina that you-?) A familiar, and welcome premise? Quite welcome, I'd say. 

And we get introduced to the shadowy figure behind our little game, and the general premise of it. Take someone's precious item, and use the elevator... We're just getting acquainted, so things aren't going to go south yet, are they?
-----------------------------------------
The Torrential Turnabout, by ¿Acid Rain?!

Find it on AA Online here: http://aaonline.fr/forum/viewtopic.php?t=13387
